name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Celebrity Blocker: Auto Block Celebs on Tiktok & Instagram #blockout

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily block users on Instagram & Tiktok

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically block Instagram & Tiktok Accounts #blockout. You must be logged into both your Tiktok and Instagram on Chrome. The extension will then automatically go through a list of accounts I got from Jimmy Fallon's followings list, and a few others. Please join the Discord if you think there should be accounts that should be added or removed. 

Leave the extension running and it will do its thing!
